recipesJson.name: Pipa del Abuelo
recipesJson.author: ChemicalBurnVictim
recipesJson.description:
I finally got all the things I needed to mix up Fearâ€™s Abuela, and thought it was great. Started thinking about how I could personalize it a little to suit me a little better. Decided I might try a little remix to make it more of a mango pipe tobacco. I happened to be vaping it alongside my Turkish for Pipe, and I decided to do a bit of a mash-up. 

So this is like a Turkish and Virginia Pipe Blend with some mango on top. 

2 months after I shared this I realized my fat fingers selected the wrong Oriental from the drop down. If you used the normal INW Oriental, you might be ok. If you got the Classic Oriental, my apologies. It should be FLV Oriental.

reviews.text: I personally like it more than Abuela. It's simple, but still offers a nice unique moreish twist (The Elder Captain I'm guessing). Love it!
